snippet.title: Shadows of Doubt - 1.0 & Release Date Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Shadows of Doubt is coming to PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X/S and out of early access on Steam on the 26th of September! 

You can wishlist the game on PlayStation here: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10010521
You can wishlist the game on Xbox here: https://www.xbox.com/en-US/games/store/shadows-of-doubt/9n7kt8fk0qhh

You can buy the game on Steam here already: https://store.steampowered.com/app/986130/Shadows_of_Doubt/
